doc.name: map
doc.description: Maps x from an original range to a target range.
examples:
local mouseX_mapped = map(mouseX, 0, width, 0, 100);
-- mapped mouseX between 0 and 100

arguments.description: The start of the initial range
arguments.name: start

arguments.description: The end of the initial range
arguments.name: end

arguments.description: The start of the target range
arguments.name: target_start

arguments.description: The end of the target range
arguments.name: target_end
